reviewText: Love Desperation Band Worship Music and especially love being able to see them perform! Hope to see more Desperation Band DVDs.

Great video if you like Contemporary Christian music. The story of how this concert came about, is an even more incredible, and unforgettable story; I learned about it on You Tube. It shows how that from tremendous pain, comes victory.
Pretty sweet concert put on by the Desperation band. I used this to show to our youth band, so they could see and learn from some of the best.
